RTCDataChannel.summary: The RTCDataChannel interface represents a network channel which can be used for bidirectional peer-to-peer transfers of arbitrary data. Every data channel is associated with an , and each peer connection can have up to a theoretical maximum of 65,534 data channels (the actual limit may vary from browser to browser).

remarks.para: To create a data channel and ask a remote peer to join you, call the 's method. The peer being invited to exchange data receives a event (which has type ) to let it know the data channel has been added to the connection.
